description: Ideal for variable temperatures, the versatile Renegade™ Cargo Convertible delivers the best of both worlds. Soft yet extremely durable, our exclusive softshell fabric is quick dry with abrasion and water-resistance. Superior stretch and Kuhl's articulated patterning provide superior freedom of motion and the ideal fit. As temperatures change, Kuhl's Stealth™ zip-off design allows you to discretely transition from pants to shorts or visa-versa.
name: Kuhl Renegade Cargo Convertible Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens
